name: flame-burst
effect: Inflicts regular damage.  If this move successfully hits the target, any Pokémon adjacent to the target are damaged for 1/16 their max HP.

flavor_text_entries.black-white:
The user attacks the target with a
bursting flame. The bursting flame damages
Pokémon next to the target as well.
